dataList.name: Sea Terror Notes
dataList.desc:
Deal +10% damage against enemies
Deal +1% additional damage for every enemy defeated or every Part broken during this Encounter (max +20% additional damage)
Can activate the above effect by breaking the same Part repeatedly.
If there are Sea Terrors among enemies, the above effect activates at maximum potential regardless of the conditions.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage

dataList.name: Goldforged Compass
dataList.desc:
When using a Plus Coin Skill, heal 5 SP; when using a Minus Coin Skill, lose 5 SP (Each unit's SP cannot drop below -40 from this effect; once per turn per Identity)

Turn Start: at max SP, or at -30 or less SP, gain 1 [ResultEnhancement] and 2 [Protection].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When using a Skill, either heal or lose SP depending on its Coin type
At max SP or at less than or equal to -30, gain Power Up and Protection

dataList.name: Silver Key Bundle
dataList.desc:
In boss fights, gain 1 E.G.O resource for the 3 least-owned Affinities at the start of the turn.

Turn End: if E.G.O Skill was used this turn, gain 3 E.G.O resource for the least-owned Affinity. (once per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: E.G.O Resource +1 for the 3 least-owned Affinities
Gain 3 least-owned E.G.O resource

dataList.name: Sea Terror Jerky
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: inflict 3 [DefenseDown] to all enemies (in Focused Encounters, all Parts)
- If Sea Terrors are featured among enemies, inflict 7 [DefenseDown] instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict Defense Level Down

dataList.name: Brilliant Lamplight
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to the Identity with the earliest Deployment order]

Every turn, the first Attack Skill to be used gains Final Power +3
If the Attack Skill was an E.G.O Skill, it gains Final Power +4 and deals +25% damage instead.

Combat Start: if this unit has [NervousImpairment] Stacks, consume up to 4 Stacks of it but gain (Stacks consumed x 2) [Combustion].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: First Attack Skill used this turn gains Final Power
First Attack Skill used this turn gains Final Power and deals more damage
If this unit has Nervous Impairment, consume it to gain a proportional amount of Burn

dataList.name: Aged Sheet Music
dataList.desc:
When using an Attack Skill(including E.G.O Skills) against a single target(for Abnormalities, a single Part), deal +10% damage
If the Skill inflicts [Sinking] Potency, [Sinking] Count, or 'Unique Sinking', deal +25% damage instead.

[Tidal Elegy Ishmael E.G.O Exclusive Effect]
If this E.G.O Skill targets only a single enemy, the final Coin gains +4 Coin Power and deals +20% damage.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage On Hit with a 1 Atk Weight Skill
Deal more damage On Hit with a 1 Atk Weight Skill that inflicts Sinking
Empower Tidal Elegy Ishmael E.G.O

dataList.name: Metal Construct
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 2 [TakeHpHealIncrease]
For Identities with Attack Skills that inflict [Burst] Potency or [Burst] Count: gain 4 [TakeHpHealIncrease] instead

[Command : Meltdown Faust E.G.O Exclusive Effect]
Any excess HP healing due to this E.G.O Skill or its Passive’s effects is converted to Shield

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain HP Healing Boost
Gain HP Healing Boost
Empower Command : Meltdown Faust E.G.O

dataList.name: Moonmirror Wine Cup
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies heal 5 SP. At max SP, gain [Breath] equal to excess SP healed (max 5)
When using an Attack Skill that applies or gains [Breath] Potency or Count, gain +2 [Breath] Count (once per Identity per turn)

[To Remain Oneself Hong Lu E.G.O Exclusive Effect]
- Awakening: When using this E.G.O Skill, instead of consuming SP, heal the amount of SP that it would’ve consumed
- Corrosion: When using this E.G.O Skill, -50% to SP consumed

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal SP. At max SP, gain Poise instead
When using a Skill that applies or gains Poise, gain Poise Count
Empower To Remain Oneself Hong Lu E.G.O

dataList.name: Classical-design Letter Opener
dataList.desc:
Skills with 2+ Atk Weight deal +15% damage
Skills that inflict [Vibration] Potency, [Vibration] Count, or ‘Unique Tremor’ deal +(15 + Atk Weight x 5)% damage instead (max 50%)

[Unbrilliant Glory Gregor E.G.O Exclusive Effect]
Awakening Skill : Deal +20% damage with every E.G.O Skill Coin Reuse (max 60%)
Corrosion : Before attacking, gain [AttackDmgUp] for every 10 [MlynarWaiting] consumed (max 4)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When using Skills with 2+ Atk Weight, deal more damage
When using Tremor-inflicting Skills with 2+ Atk Weight, deal more damage
Empower Unbrilliant Glory Gregor E.G.O
